name: Warm and Fuzzy Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Today I went to a clambake at the beach and saw this baby woolly animal.
questions.explanation:
Lamb.

	Today I went to a cLAMBake at the beach and saw this baby woolly animal. A baby sheep is called a lamb. Its mother is known as a ewe and the father is a ram. A clambake is kind of like a seafood picnic. It is typically outside and lots of seafood, such as crab, is served.

questions.text: I ate a lot of yummy food. I had a hotdog and hushpuppy; there was also food for my pet baby dog.
questions.explanation:
Puppy.

	I ate a lot of yummy food. I had a hotdog and hushPUPPY; there was also food for my pet baby dog. A puppy is a baby dog. A hushpuppy is a deepfried treat made from cornmeal batter.

questions.text: I brought seafood burritos in a container - I could only pack it tenfold, so I brought two containers so there would be enough for this furry baby!
questions.explanation:
Kitten.

	I brought seafood burritos in a container - I could only pacK IT TENfold, so I brought two containers so there would be enough for this furry baby! A kitten is a baby cat. Kittens are the subject of a lot of famous internet videos, such as the kitten who was scared by an iguana!

questions.text: At the beach, my friend and I sat down and played with a Rubik's Cube - mine had a special sticker with this baby African mammal.
questions.explanation:
Cub.

	At the beach, my friend and I sat down and played with a Rubik's CUBe - mine had a special sticker with this baby African mammal. Cub is the word used for a baby lion. Simba was a famous lion cub from "The Lion King". A Rubik's Cube is a toy that you twist around to try to make all sides the same color. It is very difficult but can be very fun to try to solve.

questions.text: The little ones put on a musical for our entertainment about baby cattle.
questions.explanation:
Calf.

	The little ones put on a musiCAL For our entertainment about baby cattle. A baby cow is called a calf. Antelope babies are also called calves.

questions.text: After the musical, I was still hungry, so I went back to get some of these baby fish from the fryer.
questions.explanation:
Fry.

	After the musical, I was still hungry, so I went back to get some fish from the FRYer. This may have been a harder baby animal to find. A fry is a baby fish. Baby fish may also be called fingerlings.

questions.text: While playing tag, I tried to stop too fast and skidded into someone's baby goat sand sculpture.
questions.explanation:
Kid.

	While playing tag, I tried to stop too fast and sKIDded into someone's baby goat sand sculpture. A kid is both a young human as well as a baby goat. A baby goat can also be called a billy goat.

questions.text: After the party was over, I helped to clean up the chicken fingers that people had left on the ground so the baby birds wouldn't get to them.
questions.explanation:
Chick.

	After the party was over, I helped to clean up the CHICKen fingers that people had left on the ground so the baby birds wouldn't get to them. A chick can be many different animal babies, such as a baby chicken. A baby female chicken is also called a pullet, and a baby rooster is called a cockerel.

questions.text: My uncle Joe yawned and fell asleep in his lounge chair, snoozing like a baby koala.
questions.explanation:
Joey.

	My uncle JOE Yawned and fell asleep in his lounge chair, snoozing like a baby koala. Baby marsupials, such as kangaroos and koalas, are known as joeys. Joeys live in their mother's pouch for a time when they are first born.

questions.text: Now, let us leave the party, for it is late and I need to sleep, just as these baby birds are waking up.
questions.explanation:
Owlet.

	nOW, LET us leave the party, for it is late and I need to sleep, just as these baby birds are waking up. An owlet is a baby owl. They are also called fledgelings, as are many other baby birds, but owlets are more specifically owl babies.
